game.title: Chronicles of Altherion
game.subtitle: AI Narrative RPG
game.description: Create your hero and embark on epic adventures
game.actionPlaceholder: What do you do? (e.g. 'Explore the forest', 'Attack the goblin', 'Talk to the merchant')

warrior.name: Warrior
warrior.description: Master of weapons and brute force.
warrior.longDescription: Warriors are experienced fighters who master the use of weapons and armor. They are the front line in any battle, protecting allies and dealing devastating damage to enemies.

mage.name: Mage
mage.description: Manipulates arcane energy and ancestral wisdom.
mage.longDescription: Mages are scholars of the arcane arts, capable of manipulating the fundamental forces of the universe. Their wisdom and knowledge make them powerful allies in any adventure.

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.description: Agile, stealthy and deadly in the shadows.
rogue.longDescription: Rogues are masters of stealth and precision. They move like shadows, attacking enemies' weak points and disappearing before they can be detected.

archer.name: Archer
archer.longDescription: Archers are masters of bow and arrow, capable of hitting targets at great distances with deadly precision. Their patience and concentration make them exceptional hunters.

cleric.name: Cleric
cleric.longDescription: Clerics are servants of the gods, capable of channeling divine power to heal wounds, protect allies and fight the forces of evil. Their faith is their greatest weapon.

paladin.name: Paladin
paladin.description: Sacred warrior, combines faith and sword.
paladin.longDescription: Paladins are sacred warriors who combine physical strength with divine power. They are champions of justice, protecting the innocent and fighting evil.

necromancer.name: Necromancer
necromancer.description: Uses dark magic and controls the dead.
necromancer.longDescription: Necromancers are mages who study the dark arts of death and reanimation. They can control undead and use black magic for their purposes.

barbarian.name: Barbarian
barbarian.description: Wild and unbeatable in hand-to-hand combat.
barbarian.longDescription: Barbarians are wild warriors from distant lands, known for their battle fury and superhuman resistance. They are the personification of brute force.

druid.name: Druid
druid.description: Guardian of nature, can change form.
druid.longDescription: Druids are guardians of nature, capable of communicating with animals and plants. They can transform into wild creatures and use natural magic.

inventor.name: Inventor
inventor.longDescription: Inventors are geniuses of engineering and alchemy, capable of creating incredible devices and devastating explosives. They use technology and creativity in combat.

narrative.startAdventure: Type your action to start the adventure!
